content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Review vulnerability scan results and web scraping results for potential targets.

Variation: Manual


1. Conduct Google dorking again primary client domains and web applications.

Examples:


site: company.com filetype:wsdl
site: company.com filetype:svc
site: company.com filetype:asmx

Also consider search for asp / PHP pages.
site: company.com filetype:asp

2. Attempt to connect to web services and access sensitive data and functionality.

Reporting Requirements


Show steps to find and exploit vulnerable web services.
Note: We could really use some automation that does this check for all domains discovered and returns a list of web service targets.
